problem_text:
7.3. Trace space for the maximal operator generated by the wave operator
Let Ω be a domain in R^1 × R^n and let □_{x,t} = ∂^2/∂t^2 − ∆_x. By □ denote the maximal operator generated by □_{x,t}, i.e. the closure of □_{x,t} defined on C^∞(Ω) in the norm

( ||□_{x,t}u||^2_{L^2(Ω)} + ||u||^2_{L^2(Ω)})^{1/2}.

Problem. Describe the space of boundary traces for functions in the domain of □.

Remark. If Ω = R^{n+1}_+ = { (x,t) : x ∈ R^n, t > 0 }, then by [18, Corollary 4.6.2] the traces in question make up the Besov space B^{1/2,2}(R^n).
